title: Now that ekko is here i think its time for a talon rebalancing.
body:
(platinum talon main over 300 games with talon)

 Not a buff or a nerf, just a rebalancing. Like was done with Ahri 

The reason i say this is because he is way too binary and doesn't really fit well with with the direction riot seems to be taking the game in. Compared with the other midlane assassins: {{champion:157}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:7}}  talon is lacking a combination of skill-cap, mobility, outplay potential, UTILITY and  lane presence pre-6. Overall he feels outdated. 

For many players talon is not fun to play as, or play against and that is why his pick rate is so low despite his obvious strength and high win rate. 

What do u guys think?
